summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3715 , for the improvement of the alley in block "A", Supplemental Plat of Block 20, G. Kinnear's Addition, being alley between Kinnear Place and West Prospect Street, from 3rd Avenue West to 5th Avenue West, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45674 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
